name: Determination (Megarev)
description:
Input is simple
WASD to move and mouse to shoot projectiles
Press M to toggle music

Determination is a game that is meant to test the player.
Its my submission to the Wowie Jam 3.0
The premise of the game is simple, it is to win against the yellow blob
But it isn't possible to beat it at the player's current state.
Earn points through your tries, upgrade from menu and beat the blob

Game Engine: Godot
SFX: SFXR
Music: Chrome Music Lab
Art: Piskelapp and Paint.NET
